column5: A much ignored/neglected cause, that many dismiss as a old geezer disease... but in reality more than 75% of those effected, by this currently uncureable disease, are under the age of 25 !  If you haven't thought of something to do with your better half on the Valentines weekend... here ya go ! I may even buy you a beer....  Note to repeats from last year... NEW venue ! ... and tickets are cheaper this year. ........................ Dear CCFC Supporter,  You are invited to join us for the 2nd Annual Rock The Cure live music event, hosted by the CCFC Simcoe County Chapter.  This year's event to held February 12th at Ferndale Banquet Hall will feature local bands: Corey Heuvel, Tonya Kennedy, Exit 61, Shawn Crozier, Dusted Bones, silent auction and hors d'oeuvres. Tickets: $15 - all proceeds benefit the Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of Canada.  Tickets to this event would make a great Valentine's gift for your loved one!  For more information on the bands, please see below:  http://www.coreyheuvel.com/  http://www.tonyakennedy.com/  http://www.myspace.com/exit61band  http://www.myspace.com/shawncroziermusic  http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=89816201891  If you are unable to attend this year's Rock The Cure event, but would like to donate, or contribute to the Silent Auction table, all cash and in-kind donations would be greatly appreciated!  Please contact Sarah McGuire at smcgui[emailÂ protected] or 1-877-917-6884 or see this link for more details: http://www.ccfc.ca/English/fundraising/upcomingevents.html  Thank you for your support!  Sarah McGuire  Chapter Development Coordinator CCFC Central and North Ontario District Office  PO Box 27007, Barrie, ON L4M 6K4
hmmm . guess it will continue to be ignored... I'll bump it once.

It is a good cause!! My sister in law suffers from Colitis and it's not fun. She ends up in the hospital at least once a year. We'd be interested in going but that whole weekend is shot, the Colonel has let me know that we are fully booked from Friday evening on. I don't ask questions, I just go where I'm told to go. Happy Wife.........Happy Life. Good luck with it!!
TTT SEE YA THERE. BETTY AND I WOULD NOT MISIT.   I may even buy you a beer....   OH,AND I DO EXPECT TO HAVE THAT FREE BEER OFFER.
